item.title: Senior Java / J2EE / SOA Developer (financial district)
item.description:
Senior Java / J2EE / SOA Developer required for a challenging development role providing innovative solutions within a financial services environment. Interesting technical role, working across all stages of a Waterfall SDLC, with a world class development team.
Working on-site with our premier financial services client you will be required to work with the business and technical peers to develop great customer oriented solutions. The ideal candidate will be a seasoned Java / J2EE Developer with prior experience implementing innovative solutions within a Service Oriented Architecture (SOA) environment.
The mandatory skills required include Java / J2EE and your core java development skills will be advanced. Experience across technologies / frameworks such as SOA, Spring, JBoss, XML and Java Script is essential. Your ability to work with raw SQL / RDMBS will also be advanced. You will have an excellent understanding of application servers, multi-tier architectures, and all layers from presentation to persistence.
Candidates that have experience working within the financial services, ideally Investment Management, will naturally be first choice. In addition to possessing an IT related University qualification, your passion for software development and your confidence to communicate effectively with users and colleagues will be paramount.
MorningGroup is a specialist consultancy firm that provides software development resource to Investment Management firms in London, Sydney and San Francisco. This role will be based on-site with a global investment management firm and you will be based in London.
